highlight-research.title: Highlight research
highlight-research.description: It's all about the research and the researchers! A beautiful and informative website for your consortium will help inform your target public about the research you are doing and the impact you are having. With Open Consortium, we help you make this easier!

visualise-consortium.title: Visualise the network
visualise-consortium.description: There is no better way to understand your network than seeing it on an interactive map.

publicise-events.title: Promote events
publicise-events.description: Text for descriptions. We can help you communicate your research and take that headache away with our communication and technology platform. It is based on open-source software, with focus on external communication.

job-offers.title: Publicize jobs
job-offers.description: Need to hire in the consortium? A well-thought out job page can make it easier for you to promote your jobs and have applications apply directly via the website.

content-management-tool.title: A powerful content management tool
content-management-tool.description: Nobody knows better than you what you want to show on your website, so why don't you build the site yourself? Powered by the popular Drupal content management system, you can add all the content yourself, whether these are pages, menus, researcher profiles, job openings or projects. We can host the site on our servers, or you can host it at your institute.

responsive-layout.title: Responsive layout
responsive-layout.description: We follow a systematic approach in designing your identity and website, involving you at every step of the process. And we guarantee that your website will look splendid on every device, whether it is your smartphone on the road, your tablet in the sofa or your computer screen at work.
